tiles.title: Introduction
tiles.content: This section provides an overview of the topic and sets the context for the following content.

tiles.title: Background
tiles.content: Covers relevant historical or contextual information to help understand the subject better.

tiles.title: Main Discussion
tiles.content: This is the core section where key points, arguments, or data are explored in detail.

tiles.title: Analysis
tiles.content: Breaks down the main points to highlight patterns, significance, or implications.

tiles.title: Conclusion
tiles.content: Summarizes the main takeaways and may offer recommendations or next steps.
